testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionControlScheduleRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.18 [Need to Share Section Timing Pattern Schedule] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Section Timing Pattern Schedule Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.11.12.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N103R1088_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N103R1088_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Schedule is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.12.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported = ${TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 5 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 7 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 8 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionControlScheduleRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N103R1088_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 9 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 9.1 VERIFY that a sectionControlScheduleMsg message was received.
Step 9.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.3 VERIFY that a section-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.4 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-number data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.5 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-month data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.6 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-day data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.7 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-date data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.8 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-day-plan data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.9 VERIFY that a day-plan-hour data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.10 VERIFY that a day-plan-minute data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.11 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.12 VERIFY that a node-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.13 VERIFY that a request-control-mode data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.14 VERIFY that a timing-pattern-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.15 IF TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 9.15.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 9.16 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 10 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 10.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 10.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 10.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 10.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 10.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 10.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 10.7 IF TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 10.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 11 EXIT
